patthana21.30:4.1: Nahetuṃ namicchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.30:5.1: Nahetuṃ nasammattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.30:6.1: Nahetuṃ naaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.30:6.2: Nanahetuṃ naaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.30:6.4: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
